title: Hot Dog in Bun Calories
meta_description: Explore hot dog in bun calories: about 280 kcal per serving, with full nutrition facts on protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard beef frankfurter (45g) in a white bun (40g), steamed or boiled, no condiments or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, meat type, bun variety, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One hot dog in a bun provides ~280 kcal, with 10g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add ketchup and mustard (1 tsp each)
Add one slice of cheddar cheese
Use whole wheat bun instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a hot dog in bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 280 kcal for a standard beef hot dog in a white bun.

faqs.q: What's the protein in hot dog in bun calories breakdown?
faqs.a: About 10g protein, mainly from the frankfurter.

faqs.q: Are hot dog in bun calories high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 800mg sodium per serving due to processing.

faqs.q: How do condiments affect hot dog in bun calories?
faqs.a: Ketchup and mustard add ~20 kcal; relish or chili can add 50+ kcal.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a hot dog in bun?
faqs.a: Roughly 15g total fat, including 6g saturated fat.
